description: Tens of thousands gather in Minsk, as pressure on President Lukashenko shows no sign of easing.
title: Belarus opposition holds mass rally in Minsk despite ban
title_page: Belarus opposition holds mass rally in Minsk despite ban - BBC News
maintext: Why does it matter? Like Ukraine, this nation of 9.5 million is caught in rivalry between the West and Russia. President Lukashenko, an ally of Russia, has been referred to as "Europe's last dictator". He has been in power for 26 years, keeping much of the economy in state hands, and using censorship and police crackdowns against opponents.
